publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3838 Bill Aitken on behalf of the Edinburgh Tram (Line Two) Bill Committee: Edinburgh Tram (Line Two) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Edinburgh Tram (Line Two) Bill be passed.
